note: I have finished producing One Love One Planet for the moment and am now concentrating on getting more coverage and conversations about the climate crisis on community radio, in particular organising a week dedicated to climate and nature in November (Our Earth Week 2023). So if you're a community radio station and not already part of the week, please sign up! And if you're from an organisation or group that may radio stations may want to talk to for that week then please dm me.
